mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_DROP(NUM, EMAIL, NICKNAME, WARNCOUNT) values (MEMBER_DROP_SEQ.nextval, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{warnCount})
mapper.select: select count(*) from MEMBER_DROP where EMAIL=#{email}
select count(*) from MEMBER_DROP where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
select EMAIL, NICKNAME, WARNCOUNT, DROPDATE from MEMBER_DROP
select EMAIL, NICKNAME, WARNCOUNT, DROPDATE from MEMBER_DROP where NICKNAME like '%'||#{nickname}||'%'
